title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: A lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. A lion in a dream is one of the frightening and frightening dreams that we see in our dreams, but not constantly because we do not constantly deal with lions in our lives and we do not see them by pure chance in case we want to go to zoos because the lion is one of the most violent creatures in it. The planet is absolute, and it is the king of the jungle, and it is possible to see it attacking us in a dream or in front of us and various Imam Al-Sadiq, the great dream interpreter in his books, many meanings of seeing a lion in a dream in all its shapes and forms, which a person must know well, as he knows to whom it will come.Interpretation of a vision A lion in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqSeeing a woman in a dream is evidence of an unfair enemy. Seeing a girl who was taken by a lion in a dream is a sign of the stress and distress that she is facing. Dreaming of unmarried people who ate lion meat is a sign of benefit and good news. Seeing a married lion in The dream is evidence that the enemy also hates her. Seeing that the married woman was able to control the lion without any harm to her livelihood. Seeing someone turning into a lion was a bad omen with great benefits. Seeing a lion in a dream is evidence of the presence of a boy. Escaping from the lion is a sign of victory. On the enemy. Seeing a person running away from a lion in a dream is a sign of freedom from fear. A lion entering a house in a dream is a sign of the presence of a sick and severely ill person. Seeing a person with a lion entering his house is evidence of the person’s coming misfortune. Seeing a lion entering the city is evidence of the spread of the epidemic in The city. The entry of a lion into the city is evidence of its emergence under unjust rule. Seeing a lion entering the city is evidence of its fall into the hands of the enemy. Interpretation of a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that whoever dreams of a lion in his dream indicates the presence of a powerful force, the presence of a ruler, and the presence of a strong enemy. He said. Ibn Sirin: If a person dreams that he sees a lion in his dream, and this lion enters his house and makes the house sick, then this indicates that the sick person’s illness and death increases. But if a person dreams of seeing a lion in a dream and that lion enters a city, then this indicates the entry of an enemy or an unjust ruler into the city. That country. If a person dreams that he sees a lion in the mosque and that the lion is standing on the pulpit, then the meaning and interpretation is that there is a ruler taking over the country, so he is unjust and unjust and tramples on the pulpit. The rights of the poor and the weak. It is interpreted as a powerful authority with power over the magnitude of his danger, the seriousness of his fear, the horror of his character and the power of his anger. He is declared a warrior, a thief, an aggressor, a treacherous worker, a holder of a position, and an enemy of the enemy. Perhaps it suggests death and distress, as the color of the viewer turns to Yellow color, which disturbs his paradise and deceives him. The usurpation of human authority indicates the oppression of the people, the enemy, and the ruler. Whoever sees a lion entering his house, a sick person will perish, otherwise he will descend from it. If he secretly confesses to him, or takes his money, or beats him, or kills him, and if his soul awakens In his dream, his head is cut off or his head is cut off, and whoever sees the lion entering the city. Because the epidemic, distress, force, mighty, or enemy is the one who brings upon them the same elements present in

title: Interpretation of a dream about canceling a trip

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about canceling a trip in a dream In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of a dream about canceling a trip in a dream according to what was stated in the books of scholars and not with personal judgments, all of this and more. Interpretation of a dream about canceling a trip in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about canceling a trip in a dream could be a sign that desires will not be fulfilled and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman is seen canceling a trip, this may indicate her inability to move forward and she must be patient, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees Canceling a trip may indicate her inability to satisfy her desires, and God knows best. If a young man sees a trip canceled, it may indicate canceling some important decisions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to the Maldives in a dream. title: Interpretation of clothes in a dream for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: Seeing clothes in a dream indicates the coming of goodness. Whether you give away clothes or buy new clothes, black, white, red, green, many, give away dirty clothes, wear torn clothes, loose or tight, whether you wear long or short clothes. You have detailed interpretations that we will return to you about the great interpretation of dreams, the scholar Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of clothes in a dream If you see yourself wearing new clothes in a dream, this indicates goodness and wealth in your life If you dream that you are wearing your usual clothes, this means that you will return to your previous life If you see that you are buying clothes Underwear in a dream, this indicates a close marriage. Dreaming of torn clothes indicates poverty. Red clothes indicate the joy of life. Seeing green clothes in a dream is a sign of worship. Whoever sees black clothes in his dream indicates money and power for the one who is accustomed to wearing them, and anxiety and sadness for the one who is not accustomed to wearing them. Pink clothes are a sign of life, love, and forgetting worries. Seeing piles of clean clothes on the ground indicates stability and success in reality. As for dreaming of clean, smelling clothes spreading on the ground, it symbolizes comfort and good news. Piles of white clothes on the ground symbolize the fortuneteller’s good intentions and justice. If The dreamer saw piles of red clothes lying on the floor of his house, then the dream is evidence of his corruption and that he has committed many sins in reality. As for the piles of dirty and worn clothes on the floor, it is a sign of the conditions of flattery that the dreamer experiences and the difficult days that he spends in reality. New clothes indicate in The dream indicates the dreamer’s next engagement date and also symbolizes happy news. As for torn and worn clothes, it indicates the illness of the dreamer or someone close to him, death, suffering, and sadness. Taking clothes from someone in a dream means that the dreamer will get a lot of money. As for changing clothes, it is good For the dreamer to hear it soon in reality. Piles of clothes carefully arranged and placed side by side in order, symbolize in the dream the happy events that the dreamer will experience in reality. Wearing elegant white clothes in a dream indicates the dreamer’s joy in fulfilling his dreams and achieving his goals soon. The dream of clothes appears in many Of different meanings and forms, as clothes are one of the important things in our lives that we care a lot about in order to obtain complete elegance in life. The translator Ibn Sirin explained to us in his interpretations that seeing clothes in a dream has many important connotations and meanings that the dreamer must be fully aware of, which are interpreted According to the state of the dream, its complete details, and the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of wearing new clothes in a dream is marriage, marriage, or engagement, and seeing clothes in a dream piled up, torn, piled up, or scattered means death or illness. Clothes in a dream are very common dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, Seeing new clothes in a dream is evidence of...

title: Green hair in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Today, through the website gptafser.com/, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of the great interpreters, including Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. As follows. The interpretation of seeing green hair in a dream for one girl: Dreaming of an unmarried girl dyeing her hair green is a sign of adornment and closeness to God. The death of green hair in a dream is a sign of contentment and comfort for the dreamer. Seeing dyed green hair in a dream indicates the extent of optimism and hope. For the dreamer at that time. If you dream that you dye your hair green in a dream, this means that happy days will come soon. See also: The blue color in a dream is a good omen for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing green hair in a dream for a married woman. Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi says that the green color It indicates marriage to a girl and a decent and noble life. When a young man sees the color green in a dream, it means that he will marry a nice, beautiful, and pious girl. Al-Nabulsi also believes that the color green in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a happy year and a life full of joy and happiness. If the dreamer He is suffering from health problems or diseases at that time. The green color in a dream means that God Almighty will bless him with a speedy recovery and recovery soon. Interpretation of seeing green hair in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man dreams of dyeing his hair green, this indicates good skin and that he will hear news Good. But if a man is pious and righteous and sees in a dream that he has dyed his hair blond, then this is a sign of weakness in his closeness to God Almighty. As for seeing a sinner who commits major sins and sins, dyeing his hair blond. This indicates the emergence of problems that will disturb the peace of his life and expose him to hatred, envy, and greed. It is severe for those around him. But if the color is black, then there are interpretations of this vision. If the person is righteous and fears God, this means that good things will happen to him in his life. And great changes and transformations for him for the better, bringing him benefits and profits. The interpretation is completely different for the sinful and corrupt person. On earth who committed sins. This indicates the misfortunes, conflicts, problems and fears that happen to him and the emergence of conflicts with someone close to him. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing green hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Imam Al-Sadiq said that the color green in a woman’s dream A married woman indicates emotional and financial stability in a woman’s life. The appearance of the color green in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the health and safety of the newborn. The green color in a dream indicates that the dreamer is moving from one stage to a new stage, which is the best stage for him in the future. If the dreamer is anxious and sad, Green is the color that suggests getting rid of the depth of that anxiety and sadness. This means getting rid of the enemies and problems that they suffered from in the past and starting a new phase, which is psychological peace. If a woman sees a green bed, this indicates that she will be pregnant. Green indicates

title: Interpretation of Hajj in a dream for single women, pregnant women, married women and all occasions

preview.html: The interpretation of Hajj in a dream for a single woman is the subject of our article today, which we present through an encyclopedia, and Hajj is the fifth pillar of Islam that all Muslims dream of as they long to go to the Sacred House of God. They circumambulate the Kaaba and there is a surah from the Holy Qur’an called “Hajj”. Next, we will explain to you what is the interpretation of the dream of Hajj in a dream according to what was narrated by the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams. Hajj is one of the five pillars of Islam, and God has made it obligatory for able Muslims, and it includes certain pillars that the servant must perform in order for God to be pleased with him. Many Muslims around the world long to visit the Sacred House of God and perform this duty, and the sleeper may see in his dream that he is making Hajj to the House of God. God or sees him circumambulating the Kaaba. When he wakes up, he wants to know what this vision is, and whether it indicates any meaning or is it just thoughts from the subconscious. Dream interpretation scholars say that this vision varies according to the social status of the viewer, and for this reason we will explain to you through the encyclopedia paragraphs below what is the interpretation of the vision of Hajj in The dream is for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Interpretation of Hajj in a dream for a single woman. According to what Ibn Sirin said about an unmarried woman who saw Hajj in a dream, he told us the following: An unmarried woman going to Hajj to perform this duty in a dream indicates her marriage to a good and righteous man. An unmarried woman who kissed the Black Stone in a dream indicates her marriage to a rich man who has a lot of money. An unmarried woman who drinks Zamzam water in a dream symbolizes a man’s proposal to her, so she will have a high status and authority. In the event that an unmarried woman reaches the age of Without marriage, and she sees in a dream that she is climbing Mount Arafat, this means that her marriage is approaching and may indicate the fulfillment of desires and the response of God Almighty to her prayers. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is performing the Hajj, this is a good vision that portends her marriage soon or the date of her engagement approaching. Seeing the Holy Kaaba in The dream of an unmarried girl is one of the praiseworthy and noble visions that foretells marriage to a man who has many beautiful qualities such as honesty and generosity. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is kissing the Black Stone, this is good news for her that she will marry a wealthy man and she will live a happy and satisfied life with him. And free from trouble. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is drinking Zamzam water, this is good news that she will marry a prominent man. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is climbing Mount Arafat, this is a sign that she will meet her future husband in The coming period. Interpretation of seeing Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing Hajj in a dream is one of the good visions that carry many good connotations for the sleeper. If the sleeper sees Hajj in his dream and sees that he is circumambulating the Kaaba, then this is a good vision. It foretells the dreamer that he will obtain great blessings in the near future. And if the sleeper is conscious

Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is drinking from Zamzam water, this is good news that she will marry a prestigious man. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is climbing Mount Arafat, this is a sign that she will meet her future husband in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great Imam Muhammad bin Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing Hajj in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that carry many good connotations for the sleeper. If the sleeper sees Hajj in his dream and sees that he is circling the Kaaba, this is a good vision that predicts the dreamer that he will obtain great benefits in the near future. And if the sleeper is

title: Interpretation of stars in a dream: Seeing a star in a dream

preview.html: The symbol of stars for a lazy, married, pregnant girl. They either shine in the sky during the day or move and fall according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing stars in a dream in general symbolizes happiness, goodness and hope, especially if they are visible in the sky. If the stars shine in the sky: If you see in your dream stars sparkling and sparkling in the sky, know That you will soon fall in love with a scientist, a lawyer, or a religious person. If the stars shine in white and blue, this indicates goodness, success, and prosperity in the coming year. If you see in your dream that you are sitting in the dark night and staring at the stars in the sky, know that the path to success has begun to open its doors to welcome you. And there is a wish that you have always asked for. It will come true soon. Stars moving in the sky: This dream has political and personal dimensions. On a personal level, a historical event will occur in your country, whether it is the abdication of the ruler or a change of political personnel. On a personal level, many things will change in your life and in the lives of those around you. Seeing the stars is not good! It indicates poverty, want, illness, and exhaustion, as well as life difficulties and psychological problems. Seeing the stars for single people symbolizes that you will soon marry a special person. As for a married woman, this dream symbolizes a good relationship between her and her husband and children as well. While if you are pregnant, seeing the stars indicates that you will have a boy and not a girl. Whoever sees in his dream that the ark is moving or rotating with him, this means that he will move from one country to another, or that he will move from one house to another, that is, in general, he will wander and travel. If one sees in a dream that he has turned into one of the directional stars in astronomy, this means that people will go to him to guide them and take advice from him. Whoever sees the astronomy rotating in his dream, his financial conditions will improve, but if he sees it stationary, neither moving nor rotating, then this indicates the opposite. That, that is, the deterioration of his financial conditions. And whoever sees himself attached to astronomy and is not afraid, this is evidence that he will try to achieve a goal or an action, and he will succeed. If a woman dreams of a star falling from astronomy on her while she is pregnant, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy and his life will be distinguished in society. Whoever sees the planets in his dream in daytime astronomy, this is a bad omen and a warning of the occurrence of misfortunes. And whoever sees the stars go out and do not shine, he will witness something similar to a tragedy. To see a star in a dream is a ray of hope for the dreamer, including that it shows intelligence and many good achievements to come, and this includes ambition that The dreamer brings it to a goal in addition to the noble morals that he possesses. Also, seeing stars in a dream indicates the good luck that accompanies the dreamer and the great wealth that awaits him, but the stars in the dream may warn him of the necessity of making great efforts to achieve goals by working hard and diligently. If the dreamer follows a star in the sky , this means that he will receive a lot of help that will enable him to achieve his dreams, and if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is climbing towards the stars, this means that he is in good health and will receive a lot of money. If the stars in the dream are red in color, this means that he will receive a lot of help that will enable him to achieve his dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mother having sex with her daughter

preview.html: Either the dreamer who sees that she is having intercourse with her daughter is a sign of goodness, and that her daughter will come into her life, and she will live in it at this time and with great happiness, God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a mother having sex with her daughter in a dream about a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees that her mother has intercourse with her In a dream and she is happy about it in a dream. It indicates the existence of a long love affair that this single woman will overcome and succeed in her life and enjoy righteousness. And seeing an unmarried girl asking her mother to have sex with her in her room in a dream. It indicates the great privilege and goodness that she will enjoy. This single woman in her life, God willing. And the unmarried girl who sees that her fiancé is sitting next to her, and her mother was getting married with her in the dream. The meaning is interpreted as the great good that will happen between this single girl and her fiancé. And if the unmarried woman has intercourse with her mother in a dream and she is very sad about this matter The meaning indicates that she will live a period full of happiness, comfort, and goodness in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a husband sleeping with his wife in front of people. Interpretation of seeing a mother having sex with her daughter in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself having sex with her daughter in a dream, and looks at her husband. In a dream. This indicates that this married woman thinks a lot about her daughter’s future and strives for her success. A married woman sees that her daughter is asking her to join her in the dream and in her room. The meaning indicates that this girl is using the married woman in many aspects of her life. Either A married woman sees herself having sex with a child other than her own in a dream and she is happy. This indicates the good deeds that she is doing in her life at this time, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees in a dream that the mother is having intercourse with her in the dream and she is happy. The meaning indicates that He will live abundantly and with great goodness, God willing, in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a mother having sex with her daughter in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is having intercourse with her daughter, then she sees happiness in the dream. This is evidence of the goodness and abundance that this divorced woman will witness in her life. And if she looks A divorced woman in a dream sees her mother having intercourse with her, and she weeps bitterly. It appears that her mother is right about some of the issues she faces in her life. A divorced woman who sees in a dream that a mother is having intercourse with her daughter in front of her is ashamed. This indicates that she will live a period of abundance of goodness and food in her life, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that the mother is attached to her daughter and is laughing. This is a clear indication that there are difficult things that this divorced woman will end up with. Interpretation of seeing a mother having sex with her daughter in a dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the mother is having sex with her daughter, he feels... With happiness. He declares that he will live with great comfort in his life and a bright future, God willing. Either the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at his wife having intercourse with her daughter in a dream. Here is a clear explanation that their daughter will reach the highest positions in her life with

title: Interpretation of seeing someone eating my food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a person eating food indicates that you see a person eating the food of the dreamer, and this is with the fortuneteller’s joy in it, because of the power of love and the strong and true relationship between that person and the fortuneteller. But if the viewer criticizes another person who takes from my food, this indicates that the viewer does not agree with that person and feels that there is no Comfort in dealing with him. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating, and suddenly another person shares his food with him, and eats with him in a way that provokes the employees’ provocation, this means that the dreamer will come to him with a job and many problems will follow. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream putting a lot of food for the safety of someone he does not know, this indicates the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will enjoy during the coming period by God’s command. As for what we will see is a person eating food as a fortune teller, and he is not interested in this, this indicates the presence of people They interfere a lot in the life of the fortuneteller, and he does not pay attention to them. Interpretation of seeing someone stealing my food. If the dreamer sees that someone is stealing his food in the dream, this indicates that the person has something that emits rays and speaks about the fortuneteller in a bad way. It also indicates that the dreamer reaches his dreams and aspirations and obtains What he wants after putting in a lot of effort and diligence. Interpretation of seeing someone eating my food for a single woman: If a free girl sees in her dream that someone is eating her food after she prepared it, and she does not accept to eat from it, many problems arose between her and that person. Also, seeing an unmarried woman who knows The one that she eats more than her plate is a sign of the girl’s dealings with that person, and that she will have a lot of kindness and abundance through that person. It is also in her vision that she is eating and another person has begun to share her food, or that she is reluctant to do so on the basis that this person is trying to get closer From her, contrary to her wishes, and he participates in all the affairs of her life. Interpretation of seeing someone feeding me with his hand in a dream: Seeing someone feeding me with his hand indicates a great deal of good and abundant sustenance that the dreamer will receive. As for what we will see, she is married to her husband and he feeds her with his hand. It shows the intense love that this man has. To his wife. It also indicates the wife’s happiness with her husband and the stability of their marital life. However, if an unmarried girl sees that there is someone feeding her with his hand, this person will propose to her and she will have the best husband and bond and will work to make her happy. As we say, seeing a pregnant woman that her husband is ready to make her happy with his hand on the condition that This woman enjoys a lot of goodness from her husband. Also, if a father sees that one of his sons takes his food in his hands, this indicates how fair that boy is towards him and his intense love for her nights and working for his comfort. It is also interpreted in another way if the dreamer sees someone taking his food in His hand indicates the appearance of some unwanted and bad things. It also explains this person’s desire to impose control over the monarch and control him. It is also said that if one sees that she is hungry in her sleep and that there is someone coming to make her happy, this indicates the dreamer’s need for money. And to feed the person she loves In a dream, the best evidence of this person’s attachment to God and his love for God

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cobra by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cobra in a dream: Among the frightening dreams, trees cause stress and tension to the dreamer’s soul and put him in a state of suffering and distress. In general, the dream is interpreted with different meanings depending on the psychological and social state of the person in his real life. Interpretation of a dream about a cobra: Seeing a cobra in a dream is evidence of the presence of some deceivers and malicious people who seek to sabotage The dreamer's life and make him suffer from constant sadness and unhappiness, as he feels upset when he sees him successful and stable in his life. Talking with a cobra in a dream is evidence of the qualities of mind, wisdom, and intelligence that distinguish the dreamer and help him get rid of enemies and not surrender to their evil and malice, as he can survive and reach To life in safety. Killing a cobra in a dream is a sign of the collapse of worries and problems and getting rid of difficult problems that made the dreamer’s life difficult and made him suffer from anxiety, weakness, and the inability to enjoy a normal life. Interpretation of a dream about a cobra by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a cobra in a dream as evidence of a person with Great power and influence hides in the dreamer and seeks to destroy him and return him to zero oil, after he contributed to a great loss that he fails to compensate for again. The presence of a cobra in the dreamer’s house is evidence of the great power he enjoys and makes people fear and fear him, in addition to his prestigious position in society, which It makes him have a strong relationship with powerful and influential people. In general, dreaming of a cobra in a dream indicates the obstacles and problems that stand in the dreamer’s way and prevent him from reaching his goal and dream, as he suffers difficulty in reaching it and succumbs to weakness and despair without trying to come back again. Interpretation of a dream about a cobra for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a cobra in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of many fears that she suffers from in real life, in addition to her great loss that cannot be easily compensated for because she suffers from severe sadness and depression. A cobra in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of toxic relationships. In her life, she falls into the harm of evil people who play the role of honest friends, but in reality they are deadly games for the dreamer. Dreaming of a cobra in a dream may indicate a serious illness that removes the dreamer from living a normal life for a short time, but it is characterized by strong faith and not surrendering to the sad reality. Interpretation of a dream about a cobra for a married woman: Seeing a snake in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the coming happy periods in her life, after she has gotten rid of the obstacles and problems that stood in her way and prevented her from enjoying a happy and stable married life without disputes. In a married woman’s dream, a cobra symbolizes breaking anxiety, solving problems, and changing circumstances for the better, in addition to many good things that she will receive in the near future that will help her provide a decent and stable life. Attacking a cobra in a dream is evidence of treachery and betrayal by the people closest to her and her senses. With severe betrayal, in addition to entering into a bad psychological state that makes the dreamer stay away from everyone and

title: Interpretation of blood in a dream by senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of blood in a dream It is one of those dreams that many people have and which causes them anxiety, but the interpretation of blood in a dream also differs from one person to another depending on the details of the dream and how it is described. Interpretation of blood in a dream Seeing blood in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the path to marriage and engagement. If If the amount of blood is a lot for a married woman, it means that she is lying to her husband. If the fortune-teller is pregnant, it indicates that she will give birth to a boy. If the blood is menstrual blood, it means that she will suffer a miscarriage. The massive flow of blood for a man means the accumulation of tension and adversity. Interpretation of blood in A dream by Ibn Sirin means illegal or forbidden money. Whoever sees blood flowing on his clothes, this means that he is deceiving others for his own benefit, so he must repent for it, otherwise he will be deceived by others. If the dreamer drinks the blood of someone he knows, this means that this person helps him and assists him, but if he drinks The blood of someone he does not know, it means that this person will help him. Vomiting blood indicates bad luck and wealth. Falling into a place full of blood is gaining ill-gotten wealth. Seeing a river of blood in a familiar place means that he will bleed in the same place. And the foul smell of blood indicates... Prohibition of money and evil, which may mean that the devil is controlling the dreamer. The flow of blood means that he will lose a lot in trade and money. The blood flowing from the teeth foretells that the person’s relatives will be miserable in the future. The blood flowing from the veins and arteries indicates great sadness and poverty. The flowing blood From the head and face, it indicates crime and illicit income. Swimming in blood or wet hands means the flow of illicit money. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing blood in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of blood in a dream. Seeing a lot of them indicates that if he is poor , wealth will come to him. Seeing a little blood and not soiling his clothes and seeing him folding them indicates poverty and lack of money. Seeing blood in a dream in Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that a dream of blood generally indicates money coming from an dishonest source, or a person getting rid of the sin and disobedience he commits or Falling into it, and this can only be explained when describing the dream accurately. Interpretation of seeing mixed blood in a dream: Seeing the dreamer himself spitting blood means that he is saying something bad, and what he says should be taken into consideration, because it is unpleasant and inappropriate. Seeing camels being milked with blood means that he will obtain a forbidden profit, but if they are milking pure milk, It heralds that person the legitimate profit that he will obtain. A dream about growing crops mixed with blood is evidence that the dreamer consumes usury. Since blood flowing from saliva is forbidden, he will gain profit and his money will be lost regardless of who sees him bleeding. Seeing wounds on the body in a dream from a dream that he bleeds a lot of blood. During his circumcision, this indicates that he will be freed from the sins and transgressions that he committed. Fresh wounds on the body from which blood oozes, and this only indicates their harm to the one who caused them. Seeing the interpretation of bad blood in a dream. Seeing bad blood in a dream

Seeing a lot of them indicates that if he is poor , wealth will come to him. Seeing a little blood and not soiling his clothes and seeing him folding them indicates poverty and lack of money. Seeing blood in a dream in Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that a dream of blood generally indicates money coming from an dishonest source, or a person getting rid of the sin and disobedience he commits or Falling into it, and this can only be explained when describing the dream accurately. Interpretation of seeing mixed blood in a dream: Seeing the dreamer himself spitting blood means that he is saying something bad, and what he says should be taken into consideration, because it is unpleasant and inappropriate. Seeing camels being milked with blood means that he will obtain a forbidden profit, but if they are milking pure milk, It heralds that person the legitimate profit that he will obtain. A dream about growing crops mixed with blood is evidence that the dreamer consumes usury. Since blood flowing from saliva is forbidden, he will gain profit and his money will be lost regardless of who sees him bleeding. Seeing wounds on the body in a dream from a dream that he bleeds a lot of blood. During his circumcision, this indicates that he will be freed from the sins and transgressions that he committed. Fresh wounds on the body from which blood oozes, and this only indicates their harm to the one who caused them. Seeing the interpretation of bad blood in a dream. Seeing bad blood in a dream
